description.overview: BlueStake is an enterprise-grade validator offering highly secure and reliable infrastructure. Our systems are distributed across multiple datacenters and are monitored 24/7 to ensure optimal performance and security.
description.team: BlueStake was founded by a team of DevOps engineers with decades of experience. We provide a wide range of services for the ecosystem and actively participate in various testnets. We are hard believers in cosmos ecosystem.
description.security: BlueStake maintains a highly reliable staking infrastructure, designed with maximum security and performance in mind. Our infrastructure is distributed across multiple datacenters and follow all security best practices: we have backup servers for all networks, we use remote signing to protect validator keys, and our infrastructure is monitored 24/7. We also offer soft slash insurance to protect your assets.
